# Deployment {#deployment}

Deployment is the ability of Tercen to be delivered to the researchers. Currently is available in two forms: cloud and on-site.

__Cloud__:
The tercen cloud is found at: (www.tercen.com)
Currently the cloud is running the alpha version of tercen.


__On-site__:
The tercen on-site requires an install and is available by sending an email to `info@tercen.com`.
Currently the on-site version are the beta version of tercen.
